statements: DELETE FROM employee_satisfaction WHERE employee_id = 100 AND well_being_rating < 3;
DELETE FROM employee_satisfaction WHERE satisfaction_level > 0.8 AND employee_id IN (SELECT employee_id FROM employees WHERE department = 'HR');
DELETE FROM employee_satisfaction WHERE employee_id = 101 AND satisfaction_rating < 3;
DELETE FROM employee_feedback WHERE feedback_date <= '2021-09-30' AND employee_id = 201;
DELETE FROM survey_results WHERE satisfaction_score < 70 AND well_being_score < 60;
DELETE FROM employee_satisfaction WHERE employee_name = 'Alice' AND well_being_score < 70;
DELETE FROM employees WHERE employee_id = 100 AND department = 'Sales';
